products.name: Kenya AA Coffee
products.description: The best Kenya AA coffees exhibit a full body and strong, rich taste with a pleasant acidity that some say provides the world's brightest coffee. The aroma of Kenya AA is fragrant with floral tones while the finish is winey with berry and citrus overtones.

products.name: Tanzania Peaberry Coffee
products.description: A medium roast provides an aroma that is floral and complex, often exhibiting hints of pineapple, citrus, or coconut. The flavor is delicate, sometimes revealing winey notes and a velvety feeling on the palate.Some long amount of text (maybe lorem ipsum for now)

products.name: Nicaraguan Coffee
products.description: Darker roasts bring compliment the chocolate and fruity flavors.
